title: Alex Court Apartments..Gorgeous One Bedroom...CALL NOW!!
posting_body: ['1920s charm meets contemporary living in this storied Los Angeles neighborhood.', 'Be the first to live in these newly rebuilt, spacious apartment homes!', 'Extensive upgrades have recently been completed including, brand-new kitchenettes with modern cabinetry, caesarstone counter tops, stainless steel appliances, new flooring, high-end lighting fixtures, and tastefully remodeled bathrooms.', 'The building offers a beautiful courtyard with free Wi-Fi, onsite laundry, secured access, and amazing views of Griffith Park from select units.', 'Conveniently located near public transportation hubs and within walking distance to Barnsdall Art Park, the vintage Vista Theater, and Kaiser Permanente Hospital.', 'A couple minutes drive from The Greek Theater, Griffith Park Observatory, and Los Feliz fine dining and shopping.', 'You can also sample authentic Thai food in neighboring Thai Town!', 'The one bedrooms are approximately 636 sq ft.', 'Also ask about our Bachelors and Studios units!', 'Cats and Dogs allowed with an additional deposit.', 'Professionally managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc.', 'For more information, please visit <URL>', 'To view a virtual tour of unit similar to 105 - 1Bed/1Bath - <URL>', 'To view a virtual tour of unit 310 - studio - <URL>', '-Quoted security deposit is on approved credit.', '-Six month lease available with $200 surcharge.', 'The rent, deposit, concession and terms listed in this ad are only valid for the actual date that this ad was initially posted.', 'Pictures in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual apartment that is currently available.']
